results.name: Cryptokitties
results.description: CryptoKitties is a game centered around breedable, collectible, and oh-so-adorable creatures we call CryptoKitties! Each cat is one-of-a-kind and 100% owned by you; it cannot be replicated, taken away, or destroyed.

results.name: NameBazaar
results.description: A peer-to-peer marketplace for the exchange of names registered via the Ethereum Name Service.

results.name: Cent
results.description: Give wisdom, get money. Ask a question and offer a bounty for the best answers. The userbase then votes to determine which answers receive that bounty.

results.name: 0x Portal
results.description: Powering decentralized exchange - 0x is an open, permissionless protocol allowing for ERC20 tokens to be traded on the Ethereum blockchain.
